lesson.description: Learner can recognize and distinguish all 4 Ukrainian passive voice forms
objectives: Learner can recognize and distinguish all 4 Ukrainian passive voice forms
Learner can identify the appropriate register for each passive construction
Learner can transform active sentences into passive using the correct form
Learner can choose the register-appropriate passive in context
